price: [Sasabihin]: “Kumain kayo at uminom kayo nang kaiga-igaya dahil sa dati ninyo ginagawa [na maayos].”
arabic: كُلُواْ وَٱشۡرَبُواْ هَنِيٓـَٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: kulū wa-ish'rabū hanīan bimā kuntum taʿmalūna
